department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: two figures with elongated torsos and short bent legs, female at L and male at R, joined at top by chain; each figure holds a smaller figure horizontally over belly; figures are naked except for headdress; bodies decorated with incised lines; female figure has a post extending below feet
dimension: 1 1/4 x 8 1/4 x 11 3/8 in. (3.18 x 20.96 x 28.89 cm) (overall, with chain fully extended)
title: Pair of Ogboni
